SELECT * from ( SELECT i.id, i.name, i.manager, i.create_time, CASE WHEN i.status=1 and 0 > DATEDIFF(NOW(),it.min_time) THEN 1 WHEN i.status=1 and ((day='max' and DATEDIFF(NOW(),it.min_time)>=0)or (day != 'max' and day >= DATEDIFF(NOW(),it.min_time) )) THEN 2 WHEN i.status=2 THEN 3 WHEN i.status=1 and DATEDIFF(NOW(),it.min_time) > day THEN 4 ELSE 0 END As status, gm.name AS game_name, ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM inno72_interact_machine WHERE interact_id = i.id ) AS merchant_num, ig.goods_num AS goods_num, IF(0>DATEDIFF(NOW(),it.min_time),0,DATEDIFF(NOW(),it.min_time)) AS real_day, i.day AS day, ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM inno72_order r WHERE r.inno72_activity_id = i.id ) AS real_num, ig.number AS number, ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM inno72_order r WHERE r.inno72_activity_id = i.id )/ig.number AS goodsSend FROM inno72_interact i LEFT JOIN inno72_game gm ON gm.id = i.game_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT m.interact_id,Min(mt.start_time) AS min_time FROM inno72_interact_machine m LEFT JOIN inno72_interact_machine_time mt ON m.id=mt.interact_machine_id GROUP BY m.interact_id ) it on it.interact_id =i.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT m.interact_id,sum(mg.number) AS number,COUNT(DISTINCT mg.goods_id) AS goods_num FROM inno72_interact_machine m LEFT JOIN inno72_interact_machine_goods mg ON m.id=mg.interact_machine_id GROUP BY m.interact_id ) ig on ig.interact_id =i.id where i.is_delete = 0
and ( i.name LIKE '%${keyword}%' or gm.name LIKE '%${keyword}%' or i.manager LIKE '%${keyword}%' )
and i.status=0 and i.status=1 and 1 > DATEDIFF(NOW(),it.min_time) and i.status=1 and ((day='max' and DATEDIFF(NOW(),it.min_time)>=0)or (day != 'max' and day >= DATEDIFF(NOW(),it.min_time) )) and i.status=2 and i.status=1 and DATEDIFF(NOW(),it.min_time) > day ) t
ORDER BY ${orderBy}
SELECT i.*,gm.name AS game_name FROM inno72_interact i LEFT JOIN inno72_game gm ON gm.id = i.game_id where i.id = #{id}
